reviews.text: This is a small and fairly cheap hotel so the rooms are basic. They are clean and comfortable. They ate quiet and pleasant. Right by the river over a couple of restaurants, I would happily stay here again.

This hotel was exactly what we wanted.  It was close to the central train station, had a great view of the river, and was close to the sights in the old city.  The staff went over and above to help us find some specific treats we were looking for, and also to answer questions and help us out.  The restaurant downstairs is convenient as well.

5 minute walk to obb and several cathedrals. Nice and small but not uncomfortable.  They let us put our bags down, and they had made up the 3rd pull out bed when we got back, which was nice. The restaurant staff were great and pointed us in the right direction every time. The showers need some grips and are kinda small, but having it in the room is a definite plus!

You can stay here with friends, everything is just enough. Don't expect more.

They don't have a nice service, kettle in rooms, liquid soap (instead block soap) and, the building is a bit old. For staying with friends, it's a nice place, perfect location. For couples, you can still stay there as couple, it's safe and clean, but don't expect any romantic atmosphere.

Every major requirements are there üëçüèæ but just it, not more than that.

Super location, right in front of the spree.
Just 5 Minute walk from the main station.
Rooms with an old toilet but fortunately really clean overall!!

We will be back
